title: Uno-X Goes Retro with 7-Eleven Throwback Kits at Liège-Bastogne-Liège
content:
Uno-X Mobility is pushing special-edition, one-off looks to new levels with a 7-Eleven-inspired kit and a special-edition Ridley that also pay homage to Eddy Merckx.

Read the full article at Uno-X Goes Retro with 7-Eleven Throwback Kits at Liège-Bastogne-Liège on Velo.
author: ahood
